metadata.title: CVE-2018-0489 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
Shibboleth XMLTooling-C before 1.6.4, as used in Shibboleth ServiceProvider before 2.6.1.4 on Windows and other products, mishandles digitalsignatures of user data, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation or conduct impersonation attacks via crafted XML data. NOTE:this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2018-0486.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0489` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxmltooling6v5 - 1.5.6-2ubuntu0.2
xmltooling-schemas - 1.5.6-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xmltooling package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.6-2ubuntu0.2').
